DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety and efficacy of Dimebon in combination with donepezil (Aricept) in the treatment of Alzheimer's disease.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Combination Therapy With Dimebon and Donepezil (Aricept) in Patients With Alzheimer's Disease
DOC.criteria: Alzheimer's disease On donepezil (Aricept) Caregiver who cares for the patient at least 5 days per week Unstable medical illnesses or significant hepatic or renal disease Other primary psychiatric or neurological disorders
